title: Search for 9 years old girl continues
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st) ; Police say that there is no information regarding a missing child from Atulugama, Bandaragama.
Previously, Police launched an wide investigation to locate a nine year old girl who was reported missing since 10 AM on Friday (27) from Bandaragama.
The girl is a resident from Atalugama, and Police said she is a Grade 4 student from a local school.
Investigations have revealed that she had visited a shop nearby at 10 AM to buy food and never returned.
Relatives and neighbors have searched the area as she did not return home, and thereafter immediately informed the Police.
Police added CCTV footage from the area was obtained to conduct investigations adding that the search is underway to locate the missing girl.
